title: Pies
creator_credit: Sheldon Cohen, Caroline Leaf and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A bizarre animated tale in which two women on the edge of town argue over whether one of them should be entitled to keep a cow. The argument develops into a planned revenge but the tale has a wry twist to it
creator_credit_for_label: Sheldon Cohen, Caroline Leaf and National Film Board of Canada
